dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5856 IH: No Armed Drones for DHS Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grayson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security

form.official-title: To prohibit the United States Department of Homeland Security from purchasing, operating, or maintaining armed unmanned aerial vehicles.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Armed Drones for DHS Act.

section.header: Prohibition on purchase, use, or maintenance of armed drones
section.text: The United States Department of Homeland Security is prohibited from purchasing, operating, or maintaining armed unmanned aerial vehicles.
